name: Brazilian Adventure
description: Fly down to Rio and enter an adventure that’ll take you to the historic town of Tiradentes. Encounter a cast of colorful characters – a pair of lovers from the past, a beautiful young singer, a crooked former KGB man and his seductive sidekick. Piece together the puzzle of a tragic romance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Storage: 900 MB available space
